thread.title: Julia Roberts unrecognizable on set of new movie
thread.title_full: Julia Roberts unrecognizable on set of new movie | Fox News

author: foxnews.com
title: Julia Roberts unrecognizable on set of new movie
text:
Published October 06, 2015 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 Email Print
Julia Roberts barely looked like herself on the set of her new film "Mother's Day," where the Oscar winner was spotted rocking a short, auburn 'do.
On Thursday, the 47-year-old star showed off her blunt bangs and short, bold bob-cut wig while walking around on set in Atlanta, Georgia.
FameFlynet MORE: Which Couples From Julia Roberts Rom-Coms Are Still Together?
It's hard to get past the stylish cut to even notice the massive glasses, but all of it gives off some major Ann Wintour vibes.
The Garry Marshall-directed film – the latest in his series of holiday-themed romantic comedies – also stars Jennifer Aniston and Kate Hudson.
WATCH: Jennifer Aniston Gets Back to Work in Atlanta Sporting Her Wedding Ring
Recently, Roberts opened up to Allure explaining that she was glad she didn't have any scenes with Aniston because the former Friends star is "so hot."
